entry.title: Re @BLKMDL3 @PPathole There is some chance it might be over 90% of daily active users, which is the metric that matters to advertisers. Very odd that ...
entry.summary: Re @BLKMDL3 @PPathole There is some chance it might be over 90% of daily active users, which is the metric that matters to advertisers. Very odd that the most popular tweets of all time were only liked by ~2% of daily active users.
